name: V8 Martini
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Rev your engines and enjoy!
carAuctionEasterEgg: The perfect drink to enjoy while bidding on that classic V8 engine.

name: High-Mileage Margarita
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a salt-rimmed glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.
carAuctionEasterEgg: Like a reliable classic car, this margarita never lets you down, even after high mileage.

name: Mint Condition Mojito
instructions: Muddle mint leaves with lime juice and simple syrup. Add rum and ice, shake, and pour into a glass. Top with soda water.
carAuctionEasterEgg: A pristine drink in 'mint condition' - would fetch a premium at any auction.

name: Turbocharged Gin & Tonic
instructions: Pour gin over ice in a highball glass. Fill with tonic water and garnish with lime.
carAuctionEasterEgg: The extra 'boost' in this G&T will have you making impulsive bids in no time.

name: Screwdriver Deluxe
instructions: Pour vodka over ice in a highball glass. Fill with orange juice and stir gently.
carAuctionEasterEgg: The essential tool for any car enthusiast - in liquid form!

name: First Owner Fizz
instructions: Shake vodka, lime juice and simple syrup with ice. Strain into a champagne flute and top with cranberry juice. Garnish with a lime twist.
carAuctionEasterEgg: Clean history, low miles, one previous owner - this drink has never been in an accident.

name: Salvage Title Sangria
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a glass with ice. Stir gently and garnish with fresh fruit slices.
carAuctionEasterEgg: Don't let the salvage title fool you - this drink has been completely rebuilt and is better than new!

name: Clean CARFAX Cooler
instructions: Muddle mint leaves gently in a shaker. Add remaining ingredients with ice, shake well, and strain into a rocks glass with fresh ice. Garnish with a mint sprig.
carAuctionEasterEgg: No accidents, no previous damage, fully serviced - this drink's history is spotless!

name: Dealer Reserve Daiquiri
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.
carAuctionEasterEgg: This premium reserve won't last long - bid now or watch someone else drive away with it!

name: Test Drive Tonic
instructions: Shake gin, simple syrup, and orange juice with ice. Strain into a collins glass with ice and top with tonic water. Garnish with an orange slice.
carAuctionEasterEgg: Just a quick sip before you commit - but we guarantee you'll want to take it home!

name: Lemon Law Lemonade
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a rocks glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a lemon wheel.
carAuctionEasterEgg: If this drink doesn't perform as advertised, you're entitled to a full refund!

name: No Reserve Negroni
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a rocks glass with a large ice cube. Garnish with an orange peel.
carAuctionEasterEgg: This auction has no reserve - it will sell to the highest bidder regardless of price!

name: Odometer Rollback Old Fashioned
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a rocks glass with a large ice cube. Garnish with an orange twist.
carAuctionEasterEgg: This drink might taste stronger than advertised - someone may have tampered with the proof!

name: Pre-Auction Punch
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a hurricane glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of orange and cherry.
carAuctionEasterEgg: The perfect drink to calm your nerves before entering a bidding war!

name: Buyer's Premium Bellini
instructions: Pour vodka into a champagne flute. Top with chilled orange juice and stir gently. Garnish with an orange twist.
carAuctionEasterEgg: Don't forget the 10% buyer's premium on top of the final bid price!

name: Frame Damage Fizz
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a collins glass filled with ice. Top with soda water and garnish with a lime wedge.
carAuctionEasterEgg: Looks fine on the outside, but take a closer look at the structure before you bid!

name: Wholesale Whiskey Sour
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a rocks glass with fresh ice. Garnish with a cherry and orange slice.
carAuctionEasterEgg: Dealer pricing - this drink costs less than retail!

name: Trade-In Tequila Sunrise
instructions: Pour tequila over ice in a highball glass. Add orange juice and stir. Slowly pour grenadine down the inside of the glass to create a sunrise effect. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry.
carAuctionEasterEgg: We'll take your old drink as a trade-in to lower the cost of this beautiful sunrise!

name: Rebuilt Title Rum Runner
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a hurricane glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry.
carAuctionEasterEgg: This drink had a rough past, but it's been expertly rebuilt and is now better than ever!

name: Final Bid Fizz
instructions: Shake vodka, lime juice, and simple syrup with ice. Strain into a champagne flute and top with champagne. Garnish with a lemon twist.
carAuctionEasterEgg: Going once, going twice, sold! Celebrate your auction victory with this celebratory fizz!

name: Vehicle History Manhattan
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice in a mixing glass until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a cherry.
carAuctionEasterEgg: This drink comes with a complete service history and documentation from all previous owners!

name: All-Wheel Drive Aperol
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a rocks glass with a large ice cube. Garnish with an orange slice.
carAuctionEasterEgg: Perfect grip and handling in all conditions, just like an all-wheel drive vehicle!

name: Certified Pre-Owned Cosmo
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lime wheel or twist.
carAuctionEasterEgg: Thoroughly inspected, reconditioned, and comes with an extended warranty!

name: Reserve Not Met Refresher
instructions: Muddle mint and simple syrup in a shaker. Add gin and lime juice with ice, shake well, and strain into a collins glass with ice. Top with soda water and garnish with mint.
carAuctionEasterEgg: Sorry, the highest bid didn't meet the seller's reserve price - try again next auction!

name: Detailing Department Daiquiri
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.
carAuctionEasterEgg: This drink has been polished, waxed, and detailed to perfection!

name: Undercarriage Inspection Umbrella Drink
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a hurricane glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and cherry.
carAuctionEasterEgg: Always check underneath before bidding - this drink has no hidden rust spots!

name: Mechanic's Special Mule
instructions: Build in a copper mug filled with ice. Add vodka and lime juice, then top with grapefruit soda. Stir gently and garnish with a lime wedge.
carAuctionEasterEgg: Needs a little work, but this fixer-upper will be worth the investment!

name: Cold Start Coffee Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients vigorously with ice. Double strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with three coffee beans.
carAuctionEasterEgg: Guaranteed to start right up, even on the coldest mornings!

name: Auction Block Aperitif
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.
carAuctionEasterEgg: Going once, going twice... this beautiful specimen is ready for the auction block!

name: Virtual Bidding Vesper
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.
carAuctionEasterEgg: No need to be present to win - this drink can be enjoyed from the comfort of your digital device!
